Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be worth every penny to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a price that reflects its value while also providing you with a substantial savings. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
